channel.title: [317]Waffle's 562 look-a-like client
channel.description:
[b]Why i did this client, base, credits.[/b] The entire reason i tried to do something like this was because i wanted to see if i even could and i wanted to learn something. THIS ENTIRE CLIENT WAS A LEARNING EXPERIENCE FOR ME. I renamed some of the stuff as i went along, and used Stewie's Client as a model for some parts of it. All in all, i've made this client to be clean. The base i used was BFMV's renamed client, it had a few tuts (headicons, hinticons, multicon, firecape textures and that was it). I'm not giving credits because i will forget people blah blah blah, i didn't do this on my own and i by no means take full credit for it.
[b]Features[/b] 562 gameframe Different way of loading models found [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=166652&highlight=Decompressor"]here[/URL] Clicking, menus, minimap, should be very close to perfect. Config.java for easy configuration. The one interface i did play with was magic. Anim ready thanks to BFMV
This client is clean and interface ready. Its not the best thing in the world but i like to believe it's not horrible for my first REAL client.
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i638.photobucket.com/albums/uu102/turtlepantsspencer/562lookalike.png[/img]
Flame, w/e idgaf. this was my first real client and i learned a LOT making it.
[b]Download link[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zz02wyzymmy]http://www.mediafire.com/?zz02wyzymmy[/url]
EDIT: This does support the new tabs, and here is the server sided stuff. In Player.java: [CODE] playerProps.writeByte(headIcon); playerProps.writeByte(skullIcon); playerProps.writeByte(hintIcon);[/CODE]
and in Client.java [CODE] setSidebarInterface(14, -1);//achieve setSidebarInterface(15, -1);//notes setSidebarInterface(16, -1);//summon [/CODE] Change the ids to whatever you want the interfaces to be. not rocket science.

Why i did this client, base, credits.
The entire reason i tried to do something like this was because i wanted to see if i even could and i wanted to learn something. THIS ENTIRE CLIENT WAS A LEARNING EXPERIENCE FOR ME. I renamed some of the stuff as i went along, and used Stewieâ€™s Client as a model for some parts of it. All in all, iâ€™ve made this client to be clean. The base i used was BFMVâ€™s renamed client, it had a few tuts (headicons, hinticons, multicon, firecape textures and that was it). Iâ€™m not giving credits because i will forget people blah blah blah, i didnâ€™t do this on my own and i by no means take full credit for it.

Features
562 gameframe
Different way of loading models found here
Clicking, menus, minimap, should be very close to perfect.

The one interface i did play with was magic.

EDIT: This does support the new tabs, and here is the server sided stuff.
In Player.java:

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon); playerProps.writeByte(skullIcon); playerProps.writeByte(hintIcon);

and in Client.java

Change the ids to whatever you want the interfaces to be. not rocket science.
